chefBio: John Smith is a renowned chef with over 10 years of experience in the culinary arts. He has worked in some of the best restaurants around the world and has won several awards for his innovative and delicious dishes.

recipes.name: Baked Chicken Breast
recipes.details: Juicy and flavorful baked chicken breast that's perfect for a weeknight dinner. Made with simple ingredients and ready in under an hour.
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Preheat oven to 425°F.
2. In a small bowl, combine garlic powder, paprika, oregano, salt, and black pepper.
3. Brush both sides of chicken breasts with olive oil, then rub seasoning mix over both sides.
4. Place chicken breasts in a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 165°F.

recipes.name: Raspberry Tartlet
recipes.details: A delicate and sweet raspberry tartlet made with a flaky crust and fresh raspberry filling. The perfect dessert for any occasion.
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsalted butter, cold and cubed
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F.
2. In a food processor, pulse together flour, butter, sugar, and salt until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
3. Add egg yolk and pulse until dough comes together.
4. Roll dough out on a floured surface and cut into rounds.
5. Press rounds into a muffin tin and fill each with raspberry jam.
6. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until crust is golden brown.
7. Top each tartlet with fresh raspberries and sprinkle with powdered sugar.

recipes.name: Ultimate Cheese Burger
recipes.details: A classic cheeseburger made with high-quality beef, gooey melted cheese, and all the fixings. Satisfy your cravings with this ultimate comfort food.
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. In a bowl, combine ground beef, breadcrumbs, onion, egg, salt, and black pepper.
2. Form into four patties.
3. Grill or cook in a skillet over medium-high heat until cooked through.
4. Top each patty with a slice of American cheese and let it melt.
5. Toast hamburger buns and spread mayonnaise and ketchup on the bottom half.
6. Top with a burger patty, lettuce, and tomato. Cover with the top half of the bun.
7. Serve hot.
